name: Revoke_an_access_token
description: An `access_token` can be revoked when a user signs out of their Trakt account in your app. This is not required, but might improve the user experience so the user doesn't have an unused app connection hanging around. #### JSON POST Data | Key | Type | Value | |---|---|---| | `token` * | string | A valid OAuth `access_token`. | | `client_id` * | string | Get this from your app settings. | | `client_secret` * | string | Get this from your app settings. |
